tool.name: MitoReport Download
tool.help:
**MitoReport Download - MitoMap Annotations** ==============================================
This tool downloads the latest MitoMap annotations required for MitoReport analysis.
**What is MitoMap?** --------------------
MitoMap (https://mitomap.org) is a curated database of human mitochondrial DNA variation, containing:
- Reported disease-associated variants - Polymorphic variants and haplogroup markers - tRNA and rRNA gene information - Control region variants - Large-scale deletions and duplications
**Usage** ---------
Run this tool to download the latest MitoMap annotations before running MitoReport. The output JSON file should be provided to the MitoReport tool as the "MitoMap annotations" input.
**Note** --------
This tool requires internet access to download annotations from MitoMap. The download may take a few minutes depending on network speed.
**Output** ----------
A JSON file containing structured MitoMap annotations suitable for MitoReport.
**Links** ---------
- MitoMap: https://mitomap.org/MITOMAP - MitoReport: https://github.com/bioinfomethods/mitoreport
